QuestData.Title: Anger in a Bottle
QuestData.Description: <The bottle the quilboar was carrying contains a foul-smelling, orange liquid. You're not sure if it's safe to drink, but it can't hurt to gather some samples to bring back to the citizens of Brennadam.$b$bMaybe their alchemist can come up with an antidote to counter its effects.>
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have something for me?
QuestData.RewardText: This stuff smells awful. Maybe Hobbs will know what to do with it. Once we get out of here I'll make sure these samples get to him.
